titles.title: I Come To The Garden (easy familiar)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And He walks with me And He talks with me And He tells me I am His own And the joy we share as we tarry there None other has ever known{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I come to the garden alone While the dew is still on the roses And the voice I hear falling on my ear The Son of God discloses{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He speaks And the sound of His voice Is so sweet The birds hush their singing And the melody That He gave to me Within my heart is ringing{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'd stay in the garden with Him Tho' the night Around me be falling But He bids me go Thro' the voice of woe His voice to me is calling{/lang-eng}
